name: cafe-pos-system
description: Hệ thống Quản lý Quán Cafe - POS System

scripts.start: bash start.sh up || cmd /c start.bat up
scripts.stop: bash start.sh down || cmd /c start.bat down
scripts.restart: bash start.sh restart || cmd /c start.bat restart
scripts.logs: bash start.sh logs || cmd /c start.bat logs
scripts.shell: bash start.sh shell || cmd /c start.bat shell
scripts.clean: bash start.sh clean || cmd /c start.bat clean
